ygData.subject: RE: Diamond Dust ? Or...
ygData.msgSnippet: It s one of the dealy-bopps he sometimes gives out apparently as of a recent patch.  I believe I first saw it on Allakhazam s site.  I know a necro who had
ygData.messageBody:
It's one of the dealy-bopps he sometimes gives out apparently as of a recent
patch. I believe I first saw it on Allakhazam's site. I know a necro who
had one, but the little bugger sold the durn thing to someone else 'cause he
got tired of trying to find a use for it.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Andy Smith [mailto:AndyS@...]
Sent: Friday, January 14, 2000 9:10 AM
To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust ? Or...


From: Andy Smith <AndyS@...>

Never heard of such a beast. I assume this is a new drop from Sanford (or
however you spell his name)?

-----Original Message-----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

I know this is a horrible expense to risk, but has anyone tried Tinmeizer's
Fabulous Compactor from the Scrap Metal quest? Has anyone figured out
another use for this device? I'm still tryin' to get me one.
